# RubyLLM::Agents - AI Documentation Index

> A Rails engine for building production-ready LLM-powered agents with built-in observability, reliability, and cost governance.

Version: 0.4.0
Repository: https://github.com/adham90/ruby_llm-agents
License: MIT
Requirements: Ruby >= 3.1.0, Rails >= 7.0, RubyLLM >= 1.0

## Quick Reference

This index provides targeted documentation for AI assistants. Read only the wiki pages relevant to your task.

## Documentation Sections

| Topic | Wiki Page | Description |
|-------|-----------|-------------|
| **Getting Started** | [wiki/Getting-Started.md](wiki/Getting-Started.md) | Installation and initial setup |
| **Configuration** | [wiki/Configuration.md](wiki/Configuration.md) | All configuration options with reference table |
| **Generators** | [wiki/Generators.md](wiki/Generators.md) | Rails generators for agents, embedders, speakers, transcribers |
| **Agent DSL** | [wiki/Agent-DSL.md](wiki/Agent-DSL.md) | Full DSL reference: model, params, caching, streaming, reliability |
| **Parameters** | [wiki/Parameters.md](wiki/Parameters.md) | Parameter definitions with type validation |
| **Prompts & Schemas** | [wiki/Prompts-and-Schemas.md](wiki/Prompts-and-Schemas.md) | System/user prompts and structured output |
| **Result Object** | [wiki/Result-Object.md](wiki/Result-Object.md) | All result properties: content, tokens, costs, timing |
| **Tools** | [wiki/Tools.md](wiki/Tools.md) | Tool definitions and agent tool integration |
| **Streaming** | [wiki/Streaming.md](wiki/Streaming.md) | Real-time response streaming |
| **Thinking** | [wiki/Thinking.md](wiki/Thinking.md) | Extended reasoning/chain-of-thought |
| **Conversation History** | [wiki/Conversation-History.md](wiki/Conversation-History.md) | Multi-turn conversations |
| **Caching** | [wiki/Caching.md](wiki/Caching.md) | Response caching configuration |

### Specialized Capabilities

| Topic | Wiki Page | Description |
|-------|-----------|-------------|
| **Embeddings** | [wiki/Embeddings.md](wiki/Embeddings.md) | Vector embeddings, batch processing, semantic search |
| **Moderation** | [wiki/Moderation.md](wiki/Moderation.md) | Content safety filtering and standalone moderator |
| **Audio** | [wiki/Audio.md](wiki/Audio.md) | Transcription (speech-to-text) and TTS (text-to-speech) |
| **Image Generation** | [wiki/Image-Generation.md](wiki/Image-Generation.md) | Text-to-image, templates, pricing |
| **Attachments** | [wiki/Attachments.md](wiki/Attachments.md) | Vision and multimodal support |

| Topic | Wiki Page | Description |

| **Model Fallbacks** | [wiki/Model-Fallbacks.md](wiki/Model-Fallbacks.md) | Fallback model chains |
| **Circuit Breakers** | [wiki/Circuit-Breakers.md](wiki/Circuit-Breakers.md) | Prevent cascading failures |
| **Error Handling** | [wiki/Error-Handling.md](wiki/Error-Handling.md) | Error types and recovery patterns |

| Topic | Wiki Page | Description |

| **Parallel Workflows** | [wiki/Parallel-Workflows.md](wiki/Parallel-Workflows.md) | Concurrent execution |
| **Router Workflows** | [wiki/Router-Workflows.md](wiki/Router-Workflows.md) | Conditional dispatch |

| Topic | Wiki Page | Description |
|-------|-----------|-------------|
| **Async/Fiber** | [wiki/Async-Fiber.md](wiki/Async-Fiber.md) | Fiber-based concurrent execution, batch processing, rate limiting |

| Topic | Wiki Page | Description |
|-------|-----------|-------------|

| Topic | Wiki Page | Description |
|-------|-----------|-------------|
| **Dashboard** | [wiki/Dashboard.md](wiki/Dashboard.md) | Monitoring UI setup and authentication |

| **Execution Tracking** | [wiki/Execution-Tracking.md](wiki/Execution-Tracking.md) | What gets logged, custom metadata |
| **Testing Agents** | [wiki/Testing-Agents.md](wiki/Testing-Agents.md) | RSpec patterns and mocking |
| **Best Practices** | [wiki/Best-Practices.md](wiki/Best-Practices.md) | Production guidelines |

## Quick Start

```ruby
# Gemfile
gem "ruby_llm-agents"
```

```bash
bundle install
rails generate ruby_llm_agents:install
rails db:migrate
```

```ruby
class SearchAgent < ApplicationAgent
  model "gpt-4o"
  temperature 0.0
  param :query, required: true

  def user_prompt
    "Search for: #{query}"
  end
end

result = SearchAgent.call(query: "ruby metaprogramming")
result.content      # => processed response
result.total_cost   # => 0.00025
```

## Common Tasks

| Task | Read |
|------|------|
| Create an agent | [wiki/Agent-DSL.md](wiki/Agent-DSL.md), [wiki/Generators.md](wiki/Generators.md) |
| Add structured output | [wiki/Prompts-and-Schemas.md](wiki/Prompts-and-Schemas.md) |
| Add reliability | [wiki/Reliability.md](wiki/Reliability.md) |
| Build a workflow | [wiki/Workflows.md](wiki/Workflows.md) |
| Concurrent execution | [wiki/Async-Fiber.md](wiki/Async-Fiber.md) |
| Work with embeddings | [wiki/Embeddings.md](wiki/Embeddings.md) |
| Transcription/TTS | [wiki/Audio.md](wiki/Audio.md) |
| Generate images | [wiki/Image-Generation.md](wiki/Image-Generation.md) |
| Content moderation | [wiki/Moderation.md](wiki/Moderation.md) |
| Multi-tenant setup | [wiki/Multi-Tenancy.md](wiki/Multi-Tenancy.md) |
| Configuration | [wiki/Configuration.md](wiki/Configuration.md) |
| Testing | [wiki/Testing-Agents.md](wiki/Testing-Agents.md) |
| Dashboard/analytics | [wiki/Dashboard.md](wiki/Dashboard.md), [wiki/Database-Queries.md](wiki/Database-Queries.md) |

## File Structure

```
app/
├── agents/
│   ├── application_agent.rb      # Base class
│   └── my_agent.rb               # Your agents
├── embedders/
│   ├── application_embedder.rb   # Base class
│   └── document_embedder.rb      # Your embedders
├── moderators/
│   └── content_moderator.rb      # Standalone moderators
├── image_generators/
│   ├── application_image_generator.rb
│   └── logo_generator.rb         # Your image generators
├── transcribers/
│   ├── application_transcriber.rb
│   └── meeting_transcriber.rb
└── speakers/
    ├── application_speaker.rb
    └── narrator_speaker.rb
```
